I had been really worried about going after reading some of the reviews but we couldnt have enjoyed it more.  Ok, so the room wasnt great - but... Aug 18, 2006 "give it a try" katiejayne , england Went not expecting what we got, beautiful hotel, very friendly staff and a view! Felt very safe as there were security present 24hrs a day. The food was quite plain but good,go early for a good choice.... Jun 20, 2006 "I will be back!" A TripAdvisor Member , Edmonton, Alberta, Canada I got back from Club Kawama on June 5th.
